channel.title: Comments on: On being part of #OccupyGezi

item.title: By: Fiona Stuart
item.dc:creator: Fiona Stuart
item.description: please notify me of new posts by email thanks
item.content:encoded:
please notify me of new posts by email
thanks

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/on-being-part-of-occupygezi/#comment-345">jezebel</a>.
We joined when the police weren't around and felt completely safe - as I said in my post, it felt great to be part of a community of people coming together to protest peacefully. When things got hairy with the police getting involved we steered clear of the protests as much as we could.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to jezebel.

We joined when the police weren’t around and felt completely safe – as I said in my post, it felt great to be part of a community of people coming together to protest peacefully. When things got hairy with the police getting involved we steered clear of the protests as much as we could.

item.title: By: jezebel
item.dc:creator: jezebel
item.description: is it also absolutely fine for visitors join to the protest?
item.content:encoded: is it also absolutely fine for visitors join to the protest?

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/on-being-part-of-occupygezi/#comment-343">Angela</a>.
Thanks Angela. I must admit that I felt pretty scared on the last evening when the street had cleared out because of the tear gas and we had no idea where the police were. We never felt scared of the protestors though - only of the unpredictable violence of the police.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Angela.

Thanks Angela. I must admit that I felt pretty scared on the last evening when the street had cleared out because of the tear gas and we had no idea where the police were. We never felt scared of the protestors though – only of the unpredictable violence of the police.

item.title: By: Angela
item.dc:creator: Angela
item.description: A great write up. It must have been really scary at times. And beautiful pictures.
item.content:encoded: A great write up. It must have been really scary at times. And beautiful pictures.
